data.name: Die drei ??? - Fluch des Flaschenteufels
data.detailed_description:
• German language only –
Pirate Fever in Rocky Beach! A literary circle is holding a treasure hunt. Is the bottle the winner gets really cursed? Who sends the threatening letters to the treasure hunt organizer? And who is the eerie guest who performs mysterious incantations at the junkyard? When Blacky is kidnapped, speed is of the essence...

Can the three investigators reveal the truth behind the pirate curse and free Blacky? Investigate with Jupiter, Peter and Bob in a thrilling case!

  • A new case for The Three Investigators
  • Detective adventure including pirates, writers, and crooks
  • Point & Click adventure with hidden object elements and many puzzles
  • With the voices of Oliver Rohrbeck, Jens Wawrczeck, Andreas Fröhlich and other The three Investigators radio play speakers
  • Many well-known locations in Rocky Beach as well as brand new places
  • A reunion with Rubbish George, Shadow and many more old friends
  • New: The six best mini-games with additional levels for endless gaming fun in the gamebox
  • For players aged 10+
